pkgmetadata.longdescription: Shuttle=======Shuttle provides a command-line interface for moving content betweenhelp desk and translation systems. It currently supports Desk.com andTransifex_... _Transifex: http://transifex.comInstallation============Shuttle is installable from PyPI_ with ``easy_install`` or pip_.:: $ pip install shuttleThis will download the latest release, along with its dependencies... _PyPI: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/deskapi.. _pip: http://pip-installer.org/License=======Shuttle is copyright 2012-2014, Eventbrite and contributors, and ismade available under the Apache License v2. See LICENSE for details... This is your project NEWS file which will contain the release notes... Example: http://www.python.org/download/releases/2.6/NEWS.txt.. The content of this file, along with README.rst, will appear in your.. project's PyPI page.News====
